title: Gas Compressor Station Monitoring
description: An operator monitors the health and performance of a natural gas compressor station.

tasks.description: Monitor real-time operational data from the compressor, including suction pressure, discharge pressure, and engine vibration.
tasks.expected_outcome: System displays a live dashboard of compressor health.

tasks.description: The system detects an increasing trend in engine vibration levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a predictive maintenance alert for the compressor.

tasks.description: Create a work order for a maintenance crew to inspect the compressor before a failure occurs.
tasks.expected_outcome: System schedules a preventive maintenance task.
